item.how_to_find_us: The Dante is located at 41 Hampshire St, Cambridge. Red line Kendall Square. Free parking on the street.
item.why: This renowned chamber ensemble from the Netherlands is making their American debut this week. Kevin Galiè will accompany them on a piece by Italian composer Sammartini. Free. Program: Sweelinck, Sammartini, Tchaikovsky.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Lunedì Italiano

item.name: Concert Utrecht String Quartet with Kevin Galiè Positiv Organ
